QxtSql Module

The QxtSql module extends QtSql with serializable queries.

QxtSqlPackagefull serialiseable QSqlQuery storage
QxtSqlPackageModelprovides a read-only data model for QxtSqlPackage result..

Detailed Description

To include the definitions of all the module's classes, use the following directive:

 #include <QxtSql>
